about_the_game:
You play as a farmhand for the LolaMart supermarket chain, and your job is to farm your allotted piece of land and use its abundant natural resources to produce and ship various goods to the company's stores.

You'll begin by doing things by hand, but you'll eventually need to construct fully automated systems to produce more types of items in larger amounts and with higher quality.



  • Build automated production lines to raise plants, trees, cows, chickens, bees and fish.
  • Unlock new technology by shipping the required items to complete quests.
  • Expand your farm by spending your LolaCredits to acquire more land and resources.
  • Set up stations to harvest and process resources like wood and iron which are needed for crafting.
  • Design lovely layouts and decorate with various fences, walkways, floorings, etc.
